name: Floor Planner
description:
Need to plan out an apartment or home space? Here's some components and templates for furniture and space layout. I needed to plan out a new apartment, so of course, I did it in Figma. Hope it's useful! This is done at a scale of 1 inch = 10 pixels, for ease of sizing.


Includes components and component sets for:


  • Basic structural pieces: walls, windows, and doors
  • Beds (King, Queen, Full, with and without frames)
  • TV's and Media Units
  • Rugs
  • Sofas and Sectionals (intended to be stretched and customized)
  • Dining tables
  • Bikes (horizontal or hanging)
  • Misc. pieces: bookshelves, nightstands, and a standing mirror


Have fun, and let me know if you need additional items! Currently missing, but will be included in the future:


  • Built-ins (counters, appliances, baths, showers, toilets, sinks, laundry machines, water heaters, etc.)
  • Additional seating options and styles (armchairs, dining chairs, etc.)
